classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
PyCloudApp API
--------------

PyCloudApp is a wrapper around the CloudApp API.

It supports the following CloudApp API Features:

    - Authenticate a user
    - Getting Infos from a cl.ly URL
    - List a user's items
    - Create Bookmarks
    - Upload Files

For full functionality you need to have *poster* as well as
Python 2.7 or *ordereddict* installed.

Note that the CloudApp API has been extended a **lot**, feel free
to fork and contribute to the project on GitHub.
info.name: pycloudapp
info.summary: A wrapper around the CloudApp API
info.html_description:
PyCloudApp is a wrapper around the CloudApp API.

It supports the following CloudApp API Features:

  • Authenticate a user
  • Getting Infos from a cl.ly URL
  • List a user’s items
  • Create Bookmarks
  • Upload Files

For full functionality you need to have poster as well as Python 2.7 or ordereddict installed.

Note that the CloudApp API has been extended a lot, feel free to fork and contribute to the project on GitHub.
